### Plot
#### dendrogram


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
    plot.margin = unit(c(1,1,1,1), "in"),
    legend.position='none'
)

category_palette <- c("Top 100" = "#FFFFFF", "LEAF" = "#FFFFFF", "Creativity" = "#E8F5E9", "Identity" = "#E3F2FD", "Knowledge" = "#F3E5F5","Leadership" = "#FCE4EC")

v1 <- ggraph(layout) + 
  geom_edge_link(aes(label = label), angle_calc = 'along', label_dodge = unit(2.5, 'mm'), size = 2, family = "inconsolata") + 
  geom_node_point(size=2) +
  geom_node_label( aes(label=name), repel = FALSE, vjust = -0.5, hjust = 0.5, size = 4, family = "inconsolata") +
  coord_fixed(clip = 'off') + 
  theme_void() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

# pg <- ggplot_build(v1)
# pg$data[[2]]
# pg$data[[3]]

```
